title: Poster, UNICEF, Summitry Works, 1995
medium: Offset lithograph on white wove paper
signed: In ink lower right on photographic inset: To d.Dan / get well / Keith
inscribed:
Imprinted in blue lower left corner: [copyright symbol] UNICEF 1995 and unicef followed by logo of woman hold up a child against a globe surrounded by laurel leaves.
In white lower left: Plaker design: Studio Works. Fotograf: Finn Rosted. Printed in U.S.A.
provenance: From the collection of Dan Friedman
description: A photographic reproduced image looking down on a room installation that contains six brightly colored tables and folding chairs. The tables, although separated, could fit together like a jig-saw puzzle pieces. On each table, variuos design work-stations are visible, including computer monitors, text panels and photographs.  Circular phtographic inserts at upper left shows children enjoying the display and at lower right, a child using a computer.  On a blue border below image in white and tones of blue: 'Summitry Works: / Words into Actions' / en interaktiv udstilling af UNICEF / 12.maj - 11.juni 1995 / åbnigstider: 10-17 alle dage / udstillingsarkitekt: Keith Godard, Studio Works. Imprinted at lower right DANSK ARKITEKTUR / [in script]  gammel Dok / & Byggeeksport Center / STRANDGADE 27 B /1401 KØBENHAVEN K

tombstone.epitaph:
Poster, UNICEF, Summitry Works, 1995. Offset lithograph on white wove paper. 
Gift of Ken Friedman. 1997-19-282
